subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|敬畏|けい.い}}: [[reverence]], [[holding]] in [[awe]], [[fear]]
* {{ja-r|敬意|けい.い}}: respect
* {{ja-r|敬愛|けいあい}}: respect and affection
* {{ja-r|敬遠|けいえん}}: keeping at a distance
* {{ja-r|敬具|けいぐ}}: a respectful closing statement
* {{ja-r|敬虔|けいけん}}: pious
* {{ja-r|敬語|けいご}}: honorifics
* {{ja-r|敬神|けいしん}}: piety
* {{ja-r|敬称|けいしょう}}: title of honor
* {{ja-r|敬体|けいたい}}: distal style
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|敬白|けいはく}}: Yours Sincerely
* {{ja-r|敬服|けいふく}}: admiration
* {{ja-r|敬慕|けいぼ}}: love and respect
* {{ja-r|敬礼|けいれい}}: salute, bow
* {{ja-r|敬老|けいろう}}: respect for elders
* {{ja-r|敬譲語|けいじょうご}}: polite speech
* {{ja-r|敬天愛人|けいてん あいじん}}: "Revere heaven, love people."
* {{ja-r|失敬|しっけい}}: rude
* {{ja-r|尊敬|そんけい}}: respect
Archaic
* {{ja-r|敬啓|けいけい}}: salutation at end of formal letter
* {{ja-r|敬呈|けいてい}}: salutation in a formal letter
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Used in kanji compounds. Not used in isolation except as a ''suru'' verb.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> See {{ja-l|敬する}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|うやまい}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|敬う|tr=uyamau||to respect, to esteem}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: More commonly spelled as {{ja-l|敬い}} with the [[okurigana]].
